Text: O̩la Nihe̩maya o̩ma Hakalaya le̩ de̩.
Hanani, o̩maye-miʼka, lewa, owñ kpai aboke̩le̩ Juda iche̩ka; tak u tʼuma ene o̩la amaJu ku ma mufu tane̩, owñ chʼame̩namu ki bo̩ le̩, kpai o̩la Je̩rusale̩m.
Taku ma ka ñwu mi kakini, Abubo̩ amone̩ ku ma bo̩ kwef amu ku ma jʼojane̩ le̩ ali o̩bata nana kpai ina; aku Je̩rusale̩m mugulo̩ wane̩, ma la fʼalaku-wñ gujo rinyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼu gbʼo̩la le̩, u kwogugu ane̩ araku, tak u nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩ adaido̩; tak u fʼaluji achadua o̩gba O̩jo̩ e-efojale.
Oñ u kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-efojale, kʼe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ inaina kʼi abailo kʼi la ade alo kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo abo ku ma fe̩do̩ owñ, ku ma la de uko̩ kʼi ate̩;

nʼeti, kʼe̩ mʼeju-we̩ chi, kʼuwe̩ ki netiru adua adu-we̩-i e-kʼu nache o̩gba-we̩ odu kpai o̩ro̩ka iko-i tod amo̩ma Israe̩l, amadu-we̩, abu kʼu do̩mo̩ agbalu adure amo̩ma Israe̩l, owñ chʼe-kʼa dʼe̩ re le̩. Ochochi, omi kpai abo unyi ata-mi dʼe̩ re me̩.
A fʼakpabie̩-we̩ che nana tabale, a la de uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ abe̩k uhio̩me̩, uhio̩me̩, abe̩k o̩la oji ajo̩ e-kʼuwe̩ ñwa ñw adu-we̩ Mose̩s le̩ n.
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ nadibekado o̩la kʼe̩ ñwa ñw adu-we̩ Mose̩s le̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ fʼada-mi je̩, nafʼume̩ fiatuka rʼef amone̩ ojoji ojoji;

ama me̩ mudabi wʼugbo mi ku me̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩-mi de ku me̩ che, dagba i nʼabo̩ iche̩ka ef ume̩ ku ma ko̩ rikpolo jʼukpoji efojale otitala, naya ma kwʼo̩mo̩ wa jo̩ tak u nako ma wa jʼuña kʼu du kʼu dʼodu-mi tʼo̩mo̩.
Abo-i la chʼamadu-we̩ kpai amone̩-we̩ e-kʼuwe̩ nʼukpahiu-we̩ inaina kpai o̩wo̩-we̩ ki gbiti gba ma tane̩.
O Ondu, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, nʼeti-we̩ rʼadua adu-we̩-i, kpʼadua amadu-we̩ ku ma yo̩ ñw ailo odu-we̩ era; nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw u ra ñw adu-we̩ eñini-i, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw e̩ne̩-i liʼowñ ejumomi.
